resources.string: The app can\'t work properly without this permission. Do you want to grant access permission again?
The permission denied permanently. Do you want to open the application setting to allow it?
There is no apps found to open link
Your account has successfully been deleted
An NFC connection is required to add an NFC key. Please do the following to turn on NFC connection on your device:
This device does not support NFC.
PIN must be between 6 and 32 digits.
Key locked, either due to too many failed PIN attempts or a power loss. To unlock, please hold the key near the device for at least 15 seconds on the next tap.
Hold the key near the device.
Keep holding the key near the device until it\'s finished.
Your password has successfully been updated
All %1$d slots on your SATSCARD have been used up
Address derivation path have been copied
Which wallet do you want to deposit into?
Which wallet do you want to withdraw bitcoin to?
Please make sure that you are connected to the Internet
You don’t have a wallet yet
We can create a hot wallet for your withdrawals, set up quickly with no keys needed, and you can back it up later.\n\nAlternatively, you can create your own wallet.
We will create a single-sig wallet for you to sweep into.
Your slot is ready for deposit
Your new fee rate must be higher than your old fee rate.
Create transaction with new fee rate
New fee rate must be higher than old fee rate
Are you sure you want to delete this wallet? Please type DELETE to confirm.
Please ensure to do the following on your COLDCARD before proceeding.
You can add COLDCARD via NFC, QR code or by importing a file.
Hold your device near the COLDCARD.
On COLDCARD, go to Advanced/Tools → Export Wallet → Generic JSON → OK → Enter Account # (0 if first time) → Press 3.
On COLDCARD, go to Settings → Multisig Wallets → Import via NFC
On COLDCARD, go to Ready To Sign → Press 3
On COLDCARD, go to Settings → Multisig Wallets → <Select wallet> → Coldcard Export → Press 3.
On COLDCARD, go to Advanced/Tools → Export Wallet → Generic JSON → OK → Enter Account # (0 if first time) → Press 3.
On COLDCARD, go to Advanced/Tools → NFC Tools → Sign Message.
Keep holding your device near the COLDCARD until it\'s finished.
Which type of wallet do you want to import?
The software key will be stored locally on this device.
A Primary Key is a dual-purpose key that can be used both for account-based authentication and for signing Bitcoin transactions. Please note the following:
If you choose to proceed, your Primary Key will be replaced with a new one. Your current Primary Key will be downgraded to a regular key.
If you have assigned the current Primary Key to any wallets, those wallets will remain unchanged. You will need the existing key in order to sign transactions in those wallets.
Please do not delete it if there is still a balance.
Are you sure you want to delete this account? All your keys and wallets will be removed. Please make sure that you have backups.\n\nPlease type DELETE to confirm.
To create a Primary Key account, you need to be connected to the Internet. Please check and try again.
Neither this account nor this key has a passphrase. Anyone who has access to your device can use this key to sign malicious transactions.
Primary Key has been successfully replaced
New XPUB needed. Please tap your card again on the next screen.
Your new wallet will be a 2-of-%1$d multisig wallet.
Two keys are always required for spending.
\n\nYou will have possession of two keys. The third key will be held by Nunchuk on our secure server.
\n\nYou will have possession of three keys. The fourth key will be held by Nunchuk on our secure server.
Enter the confirmation code we sent to %1$s. Resend code

On the next screen, place and hold your card as close as possible to the NFC chip on your phone. Please make sure you hold it until there is a success notification.\n\nIf you are unsure where the chip is, please refer to your phone manual.
On the next screen, bring your phone as close as possible to the COLDCARD’s NFC chip, which is centered around number 8 on the keypad.
Interacting with NFC devices will require bringing them as close as possible to the phone’s NFC chip. Please take a moment to locate where the chip is. If you are unsure, refer to your device manual.
An encrypted backup for the TAPSIGNER will be stored on the server.
Enter your Backup Password below and the app will check it for you.\n\nAll verification data will stay locally on the device and will be erased immediately afterward.

The encrypted backup that we just saved will be used to recover the TAPSIGNER’s private key in case you lose the card, or the card malfunctions.\n\nIn order to unlock the backup later, you will need the Backup Password printed on the back of the card (it might be listed under “Backup key”).
Do you want to add an existing key?
We notice that you have these %1$s
Take me to add a new key
What is the TAPSIGNER backup for?
Your backup has been successfully verified.
I’ll come back to this later
Are you sure you have verified the backup? key recovery might not work with an unverified backup.

We’ll walk you through the entire process to get your multisig wallet set up.

It will take a few minutes—so find somewhere private, make yourself comfortable and let’s get started!

P.S.: You’ll need an active Internet connection.
You have already added this key.
What is the Nunchuk platform key?
This key will be managed by our secure server. It can automatically co-sign transactions based on the policies that you will configure in the next step.
The Nunchuk server will never initiate or be the first one to sign a transaction.
A co-signing delay gives you time to detect errors or unauthorized access before a transaction is broadcast.
You can always bypass the co-signing delay by using your own keys.
What would you like to name this wallet?
Fill in the security questions and answers below. They will be used to prevent unauthorized access to security-sensitive features. Answers are case-sensitive.
Congratulations! Your wallet has been created

To access the wallet configuration file or export it to your device later, navigate to the wallet → View wallet config → More menu → Export wallet configuration.\n\nFor best security, the keys should be stored in physically distributed locations.
Since you will need all keys to sign off on the inheritance plan, [B]we recommend that you set up the inheritance plan first before distributing the keys to the keyholders.[/B]
%1$s is requesting to make the following changes to the platform key co-signing policies.
For security, please re-enter your password.
Please set a delay that is less than 168 hours.
Are you sure you want to restart the wizard? All wizard data will be cleared.
This TAPSIGNER will be your designated inheritance key.\n\nPlease take a moment to mark or label this key.

[B]The inheritance key is designed to be used exclusively for the purpose of inheritance.[/B] As such, it should rarely be accessed. However, in an emergency, it can function as a backup signing key.\n\nWe recommend that you put it away in a safe place. Only use this key to sign daily transactions as a last resort.
Set up an inheritance plan for this wallet
Please ensure to do the following before proceeding:
Follow the vendor\'s instruction on how to set up your device with a seed phrase.
To unlock the device, you might need to enter a PIN and/or a PASSPHRASE directly on the device screen.
The platform key will only co-sign transactions if the total amount spent has not exceeded the spending limit.

The Nunchuk inheritance plan allows you to safely pass along your bitcoin to your loved ones, while not affecting the security of your day-to-day wallet usage.\n\nBefore we begin, here are some definitions.

Your inheritance plan is uniquely identified by a Magic Phrase. The phrase can be used to look up your plan later.\n\n[B]Make note of this Magic Phrase[/B]. You will need to share it with the Beneficiary or Trustee.
Please give app the permission to use this feature
Among your keys, select one key to be the inheritance key.
What type of key do you want to add?
Are you sure want to discard the changes?
Are you sure want to cancel the changes?
Roll over to a new assisted wallet
If you lost a TAPSIGNER or the card malfunctions, this procedure will recover the TAPSIGNER’s private key using the encrypted backup from the server. Please note the following:
The key recovery procedure currently only supports TAPSIGNER.
The Backup Password is required, please have it ready. The password is printed on the back of the TAPSIGNER. You should have had a copy of this when setting the TAPSIGNER up for the first time.
This procedure will convert the TAPSIGNER into a software key managed by this device.
Please answer the following question. Answer is case-sensitive.
Please enter the Backup Password for [B]%1$s[/B] (card ID: [B]%2$s[/B].)
The password is printed on the back of the TAPSIGNER. You should have had a copy of this when setting up the TAPSIGNER for the first time.
Invalid Backup Password. Please try again.
The software key is stored on this device
You can continue signing transactions using this software key
If you suspect that someone has gained possession of the key, we recommend that you roll over your balance to a new wallet.
I want to replace my key
Your TAPSIGNER’s private key has been successfully recovered and converted into a software key. Please note the following:
If you feel that there is an imminent threat or just want to disable wallet access temporarily, you can activate the emergency lockdown. Please note the following:
Once you have entered the lockdown, no one—including yourself—will be able to sign in to your account and access your wallet.
There is no way to end the lockdown early.
Access will be automatically re-enabled once the lockdown period ends.
Your access will be automatically re-enabled once the lockdown period ends.
Your account is now under lockdown
For confirmation, please sign a test message using one of the keys below.
Please select the TAPSIGNER you want to recover
Please make note of these important details
For security, please re-enter your password.
To confirm the use of biometric sign in, please re-enter your password.
Please sign a test message using one of the keys below.
Even with the correct Magic Phrase and Backup Password, one cannot claim the inheritance before this date.

[B]Only on or after this date,[/B] a Beneficiary or Trustee can claim the inheritance.

You can change the Activation Date later via the Services tab.

We recommend an Activation Date not too far in the future (e.g. 2 years from now). Review the plan annually and adjust the date if necessary to avoid long term uncertainties.
Would you like to leave a message?
After the Beneficiary or Trustee claims the inheritance, they will be able to see this message.
On the Activation Date, would you like us to notify the Beneficiary or Trustee of the inheritance plan? If so, please provide an email address.
You are still personally responsible for sharing the Magic Phrase and Backup Password with the Beneficiary or Trustee. The notification email won’t include these information.
The platform key policies have been updated
Please manage your subscription through our website. Sign in and navigate to the Plan and Invoices page.
You can order new hardware by using the referral links on our website. Sign in and navigate to the Hardware Replacement page
Your lockdown period extends beyond your current subscription. Please renew your subscription first on our website.

A scheduled broadcast allows a transaction to be automatically broadcast at a later date.

[B]This action will lock some or all of your coins (UTXOs)[/B]. These coins will not be spendable during this time. If you need to spend them immediately, please cancel the scheduled transaction first.

Please select a broadcast date and time.
Get more out of Nunchuk with an assisted wallet
Here are some of the things that you can do with an assisted wallet:
Eliminate single points of failure by using multisig: two keys are always required for spending. The loss of any one key will not compromise your funds.
Plan your inheritance in a non-custodial way and ensure that your bitcoin can be safely passed on to your loved ones. Compatible with existing estate plans.
Lock your wallet access when there is a security threat or when you go off the grid.
Set up scheduled payments, extra security measures for withdrawing large amounts of bitcoin, and more.
Have peace of mind knowing that your wallet backups are encrypted and stored securely in the cloud. Assisted recovery is a breeze.
Chat to an expert directly within the app when you run into issues.
Get exclusive discounts when purchasing signing devices from our partners.
This feature is only available with an assisted wallet. Please create one first.
(The Backup Password is printed on the back of the inheritance key)
(The Backup Passwords are printed on the back of the inheritance keys)
To include multiple email addresses, separate them by commas or spaces.
The inheritance plan has been set up!
The Magic Phrase and Backup Password must be shared with the party or parties eligible for the inheritance. Please select your option:
The Beneficiary has full control over the inheritance. Upon the Activation Date, they can claim the inheritance for themselves.
A Trustee has full control over the inheritance. Upon the Activation Date, the Trustee can help the Beneficiary claim the inheritance on their behalf.
The Beneficiary and the Trustee have joint control over the inheritance. Upon the Activation Date, the Beneficiary and Trustee will need to combine their secrets in order to claim the inheritance.
You are solely responsible for sharing the Magic Phrase and Backup Password with the %s. Failure to share will result in the inheritance being unclaimable.
The Backup Password for the encrypted backup.
Please share these two secrets with the Beneficiary:
Please share these two secrets with the Trustee:
Please share one secret with the Beneficiary and the other secret with the Trustee. [B]Neither party should have both secrets.[/B]
You can review these information again by navigating to Services → View inheritance plan.
Please enter the Magic Phrase and Backup Password
Need support? Chat with an expert
The inheritance plan has been cancelled
The inheritance plan has been updated
Congratulations! You have unlocked your inheritance
You now have the option to withdraw a small amount first and withdraw the remaining balance later, or withdraw the entire balance at once.
It looks like the original subscription has expired for more than 3 years. To claim the inheritance, please reactivate the plan first by visiting nunchuk.io/claim.
Take me to reactivate the plan
Please start the claiming process by visiting nunchuk.io/claim.
Can not sign, please try again
Are you sure you want to sign in remotely on another device?
I’ve got it, dismiss banner from home
Are you sure you want to perform a force refresh?
Are you sure you want to perform a force refresh? This process will clear this wallet’s existing data (including notes and pending transactions) and attempt to re-sync it with the blockchain.
You can resume the wizard anytime from the Wallets tab.
Card ID does not match. Please try a different card.
The owner of this plan set up a buffer period before the inheritance can be claimed
I don’t need a buffer period

A buffer period is extra time that you can add after the claimant has provided the secrets and before the inheritance can be claimed. The buffer period helps you prevent unauthorized claims.\n\nAn email notification will be sent when the buffer period begins.
For extra security, you can disable NFC on COLDCARD between uses.
Please provide a valid email address
Your account has been signed out
Set up an inheritance plan for %1$s
This coin is not in any collections.
There are currently %s coins that have this tag. Are you sure you want to delete this tag?
There are currently %s coins that have this tag. Are you sure you want to delete this collection?
Are you sure you want to remove this coin from %s?
The send amount must be less than or equal to the total amount you selected
Select the default fee rate for your transactions
Move all new coins to this collection
Coins that have been added to this collection will appear here.
Coins that have been labeled with this tag will appear here.
There are currently no locked coins.
The send amount exceeds the total value of all unlocked coins. Please unlock more coins and try again.
The selected coins include locked coins. Would you like to unlock them to create the transaction?
For Jade, Passport, Keystone and SeedSigner
The import might overwrite existing labels. Are you sure you want to continue?
Please note that certain Nunchuk labels might not be supported by BIP329. Are you sure you want to continue?
Please use the desktop app to sign with this key
%1$s is requesting to create the inheritance plan for %2$s:
%1$s is requesting to make the following changes to the inheritance plan for %2$s:
%1$s is requesting to cancel the inheritance plan for %2$s.
The inheritance plan for %1$s will be canceled.
The Activation Date for the inheritance plan for %1$s will change from %2$s to %3$s.
No Internet connection. Please try again later.
The inheritance planning request has been sent.
For security, you will need approval from another keyholder before you can set up an inheritance plan for this wallet. Would you like to send a request now?
Who is the primary owner of this wallet?
The name of primary owner will be used to index and organize your wallets.
Are you sure to remove the contact?
For security, please re-enter your passphrase.
This key (%1$s) already exists. Do you want to change the key type?
This key (%1$s) already exists. Do you want to change the key type?\n[B]This action will delete the software key from this device.[/B]
This key has already been added. Do you want to change the key type?
Email has been changed. Please sign in again.
Create a new wallet using existing keys.
Quickly create a hot wallet for immediate use and back it up later. No existing keys required.
Last checked: More than 1 year ago
Last checked: Less than 6 months ago
Last checked: More than 6 months ago
Are you sure you want to remove %s from saved addresses?
Congratulations! A new wallet has been created

A new wallet that includes the new key(s) has been created. The new wallet will get the original wallet’s name. The original wallet will be renamed as [DEPRECATED] %1$s.\n\nFor best security, please keep your keys stored in physically distributed locations.
Your balance has been transferred over to [B]%1$s[/B].\n\nThe old wallet is now deactivated.
Take me to my new wallet
To sign in to your account

%1$s, you will be asked to sign a dummy transaction that sends 10,000 sat (%2$s) to your own wallet%3$s.\n\n[B]The dummy transaction uses a fake input and does not move any of your real bitcoins. It will not be broadcast and will be immediately removed afterwards.[/B]

%1$s, you will be asked to sign a dummy transaction that sends 10,000 sat (%2$s) to your own wallet.\n\n[B]The dummy transaction uses a fake input and does not move any of your real bitcoins. It will not be broadcast and will be immediately removed afterwards.[/B]
. Since more than one signature is required, other keyholders will also be notified
The estimated fee is calculated using current market conditions. You can set your own fee via the fee settings below.

To verify that you are the account owner, please enter the master public key (XPUB) of one of the keys in your assisted wallets. You can find the XPUBs in your wallet configuration (BSMS file). You can also paste in the entire BSMS file.
Put your device near the NFC key. Please verify the address on the device:
This email address already has an associated referral link. Do you want to reuse it?
You can always find your referral link in the Profile tab if you want to invite friends later.
We\'ll send you an email to confirm (or change) the reward address each time there\'s a successful referral.
Please use the desktop app to add this key.
Do you want to allow “Nunchuk” to use Fingerprint?
This app uses Fingerprint to confirm your identity
Please set up Fingerprint on your phone first by going to your device’s Settings.
You can use your fingerprint to sign in to your account.
Fingerprint is not enabled on this device. Please activate it in your phone’s settings and try again, or sign in using your password.
The hot wallet containing this key must be backed up before this key can be used in another wallet. Please back it up first.
Please choose the type of wallet you want to create:
Let our Setup Wizard guide you step-by-step to effortlessly create an assisted wallet.
Set up and manage your Bitcoin wallets independently. Perfect for experienced users.
Improve your security, plan your inheritance, set spending limit, and more. Learn about our assisted services now.
Choose between single and multi-signature setups. Existing keys required.
Quickly create a wallet for immediate use—no existing keys required. Back up later.
Collaboratively manage Bitcoin with multiple people or devices.
Generate a concealed wallet, accessible via a specific PIN.
The wallet link has expired or the wallet has already been created.
The wallet link has expired or the wallet has already been created.
Replace key(s) and set up a new group wallet
Build custom spending rules with signatures, timelocks, and hashlocks.

Miniscript is a structured language for writing Bitcoin scripts in a more efficient, composable, and analyzable way. It simplifies complex spending conditions by allowing logical combinations of signatures, timelocks, and hashlocks.\n\nWith Miniscript, users can create flexible wallet rules while ensuring security and compatibility with Bitcoin’s scripting system. This makes it ideal for advanced multisig setups, automated recovery mechanisms, and custom wallet logic.
Automatically selects the highest fee from available signing policies if the fee difference is below your configured threshold
Adds the latest block height to the PSBT to prevent fee sniping attacks
To use a Taproot script, the wallet’s address type must be Taproot. Would you like to change it now?
This key is already used in this miniscript. Select a different BIP-32 path to derive a new child key, or add it in a separate miniscript instead.
Failed to read data or script has invalid syntax
Total number of public keys in the multisig
Unlock after a fixed point (specific date or block)
Unlocks after a set period from the time coins are received. Transfers within the same wallet will reset the timelock.
Unlock after a specific time (Unix timestamp)
Unlock after a specific block number
Unlock after the target block number
Please enter a value between the current block height and 499999999
Invalid timestamp. Enter a value between 0 and 388 days.
Invalid block height. Enter a value between 0 and 65,535 blocks.
Please select a date between today and the year 11516
